DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter , open-label , randomize , control phase III clinical trial evaluate activity safety PM01183 versus PLD topotecan control arm patient platinum-resistant ovarian cancer . PM01183 explore single agent experimental arm ( Arm A ) versus PLD topotecan control arm ( Arm B ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Lurbinectedin ( PM01183 ) Platinum Resistant Ovarian Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Age > /= 18 year Confirmed diagnosis unresectable epithelial ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer . Platinumresistant disease ( PFI : 16 month last platinumcontaining chemotherapy ) . Evaluable disease accord Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) v.1.1 criterion No three prior systemic chemotherapy regimens Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status ( PS ) ( ECOG PS ) â‰¤ 2 Adequate hematological , renal , metabolic hepatic function Concomitant diseases/conditions : cardiac disease , immunodeficiency , chronic active hepatitis cirrhosis , uncontrolled infection , bowel obstruction , major illness Prior treatment PM01183 , trabectedin , PLD topotecan . Requirement permanent frequent ( i.e. , per week ) external drainage within two week prior randomization
